name: Star Tracer
description:
Steer your spaceship to look for an ideal planet in Star Tracer, an action-filled rhythm game with narrative elements.  Hit the star-shaped notes to gain energy, and beware of space monsters!

　

Features

 ・A rhythm game mixed with action and narrative elements 

 ・Immersive and inspirational music arranged according to the plot 

 ・Classic sci-fi artistic style fulfilling the charming space travel

　How to Play

・A, S, D - hit notes

・←, → - move spaceship

・T - open tutorial 

・O - open options

　

Star Tracer is a rhythm game.

You should hit star-shaped notes on time while keeping your spaceship avoiding those space monsters.

Star Tracer is a rhythm game.

You should hit star-shaped notes on time to gain energy.

Meanwhile, you should keep your spaceship avoiding those space monsters from energy loss.

The energy bar shows at the right side of the screen.

Your goal is to gain 60% or more energy in NORMAL MODE; 80% or more energy in HARD MODE.

<RULE 2>

Press the corresponding key as below when a Single Note hits the judgment area of a track.

Left Track   → A Key

Middle Track  → S Key

Right Track → D Key

# You don’t need to move your spaceship to the track.

<RULE 3>

You should hold down the key when the note is a Long Note.

Remember to release the key when the note ends.

　 <RULE 4>

You should press 2 keys at the same time when the note is a Wide Note.

　 <RULE 5>

If there is a monster in your current track, press ←/→ key to avoid it.

By the way, a monster is also counted as a note.

　 <RULE 6> 

There are some achievements you can get as below.

C: clear the stage

F: hit every note

P: hit every note in perfect timing

Finally, have fun, and thank you for playing!
